title: SMC_GetMaxSetVelocity (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GetMaxSetVelocity
This function block may be employed to measure the maximum value of velocity of an axis.
Measuring will be done if
bEnable
is
TRUE
, and will be reset to 0,
if
bEnable
is
FALSE
. With
dwTimeStamp
you can provide
a call counter, which is latched output in
dwTimeAtMax
with a new maximum value.

rows.Name: bEnable
rows.Comment: TRUE: Starts execution of the function block.

rows:
Optional time stamp input; can be used to find out when the
maximum occured.

TRUE: Eecution of the function block is not finished
yet.
